name: Defender of the nature
description:
Have you ever wanted to change this wonderful and wonderful world for the better? It has long been known that the environmental problems that all the inhabitants of our planet now face are fraught with great danger. And tasks such as protecting the environment, protecting animals and protecting the environment are paramount. That is why games about the protection of the environment are gaining increasing popularity.

We are very pleased to introduce you and your kids our new game from the category of environmental games: "Defender of the nature".

This fascinating ecological game will show your kids to find out what environmental protection really is, what environmental problems exist at the moment, what are the ways to protect the environment and the world around us. But most importantly - it will teach your children to love and respect nature, help to understand: why nature protection is needed, why it is necessary to protect nature and how to do it.

If you are determined to become an environmentalist, then this game is for you. You just need to download it to your device and start playing. And you will be very surprised to learn how much you can change in this wonderful world!

Features:
- Playing mini games - you will need to perform interesting tasks;
- Clean up gardens, parks and playgrounds from garbage;
- Plant trees and flowers, make your city beautiful and cozy;
- Sort the waste by species, clean the river and ponds of debris;
- Clean all garbage in your city!
